title: wont download from google playstore
creator: mawfoster
content: I try to download the app from the playstore, and it says Thunderbird will install soon, but soon never comes. I never get to the stage where you confirm the path name

title: retrieving messages from other folders than the inbox
creator: DMan
content:
Hi.

I have several email accounts that are hosted at one.com. With all these accounts I cannot retrieve messages from the IMAP-folders other than from the Inbox. I have tried with reinstalling the Thunderbird app, both betaversion and the stable version and subsequently I also have reinstalled all email accounts. I cannot find anything in the settings that solvs this issue. Anyone who knows what the problem can be and how to solve it?

/D
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/139.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;os:Android version 13

title: where can I find avatars in account settings?
creator: ndalliard
content:
the latest release of thunderbird android 12.0 states under new:

  • Add support for avatars in account settings

where can i find that setting? or is this a bug?
